item.title: My crafting use item on item
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Ah, I just saw something O.o

if((itemUsed == 1733 && useWith == 1745))//Make Green Dragonhide Chaps { if(playerLevel[12] >= 59) { if((playerHasItem(1734, 1); == false) { sendMessage("You need thread to do that!"); } else if((playerHasItem(1734, 1) == true){ sendMessage("You craft a pair of Green Dragonhide Chaps..."); deleteItem(1734, getItemSlot(1734), 1); addItem(1099, 1); addSkillXP(400, 12); } else if(playerLevel[12] <= 59) { sendMessage("You need at least 60 crafting to make Green Dragonhide Chaps!"); } }

BTW, did you get the mining cases? I also have my own version of runecrafting

Read full topic

item.title: My crafting use item on item
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Oh yea, forgot about that I just took out the the part where the pickaxe was needed.

As for your problem, try this

if((itemUsed == 1733 && useWith == 1745))//Make Green Dragonhide Chaps { if((playerHasItem(1734, 0); { sendMessage("You need thread to do that!"); } else if((playerHasItem(1734, 1){ sendMessage("You craft a pair of Green Dragonhide Chaps..."); deleteItem(1734, getItemSlot(1734), 1); addItem(1099, 1); addSkillXP(400, 12); } else if(playerLevel[12] <= 59) { sendMessage("You need at least 60 crafting to make Green Dragonhide Chaps!"); } }

item.title: My crafting use item on item
item.dc:creator: @MMcgrady1 MMcgrady1
item.description:
@MMcgrady1 wrote:

I’m trying to make it so you require both 1 thread, needle, green d-leather, and a crafting level of 60, but I get 100 errors when I add this, what’s wrong with it? It’s in the right area. if((itemUsed == 1733 && useWith == 1745))//Make Green Dragonhide Chaps { if(playerLevel[12] >= 59) { if((playerHasItem(1734, 1); == false) { sendMessage("You need thread to do that!"); } else if((playerHasItem(1734, 1) == true) sendMessage("You craft a pair of Green Dragonhide Chaps..."); deleteItem(1734, getItemSlot(1734), 1); addItem(1099, 1); addSkillXP(400, 12); } } else if(playerLevel[12] <= 59) { sendMessage("You need at least 60 crafting to make Green Dragonhide Chaps!"); } }
